expert_definitions.vision_specialist: An expert in computer vision, image analysis, visual content processing, creating charts and visualizations, analyzing screenshots, and any tasks involving visual elements or image processing.
expert_definitions.code_architect: A senior software engineer specialized in writing production-quality code, debugging complex issues, designing scalable architectures, implementing APIs, and building robust applications using modern frameworks and best practices.
expert_definitions.data_scientist: A data analysis expert skilled in statistics, machine learning, mathematical modeling, data visualization, statistical analysis, hypothesis testing, and extracting insights from complex datasets.
expert_definitions.creative_writer: A creative professional expert in writing engaging content, storytelling, creative writing, content marketing, copywriting, and producing compelling narratives for various audiences.
expert_definitions.research_assistant: A knowledgeable research specialist skilled in gathering information, explaining complex topics, providing educational content, answering questions across diverse domains, and synthesizing information from multiple sources.
